actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that President Ford should grant a pardon to Otto Kerner, Jr., for the same reasons a Presidential pardon was granted to Richard M. Nixon.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that President Ford should grant a pardon to Otto Kerner, Junior, for the same reasons a Presidential pardon was granted to Richard M. Nixon.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that President Ford should grant a pardon to Otto Kerner, Jr., for the same reasons a Presidential pardon was granted to Richard M. Nixon.
